headline: Globex launches subscription-first stores
summary: Globex is rolling out subscription membership tiers across EMEA retail footprint to stabilize revenue.

headline: Vertex Analytics secures Series D
summary: New funding earmarked for LATAM revenue teams and pricing experimentation.

headline: Acme announces AI Ops center
summary: Acme consolidates RevOps, Finance, and Success analytics into a shared operations center.
